subject: Automobile Racing
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon was fined $100,000 and docked 25 points for intentionally wrecking Clint Bowyer in a Nascar race Sunday at Phoenix International Raceway.
snippet: Jeff Gordon was fined $100,000 and docked 25 points for intentionally wrecking Clint Bowyer in a Nascar race Sunday at Phoenix International Raceway.
